Text: Stepenovitch Cc Stewart Joe would like to talk to Tonya before she leaves Houston to set up a dialog and line of communication to help facilitate further communication between them He will need her phone number where by he can call her in Florida He also wants to see his child and is most anxious to see his son as soon as possible either this weekend on no later then next I dont see the need for supervised possession under the currents situation as was suggested in you earlier arrangement I would like to set up a formal program for routine possession hopefully before she leaves Please call me Donn
